        public static void fadeAnimation(android.content.Context context,
                                 android.view.View view,
                                 int animation,
                                 boolean isFadeIn)
        Method is used to fade in/out views. Has no start offset time interval
        Parameters:
        context - Interface to global information about an application environment
        view - The views to fade
        animation - The animation type
        isFadeIn - Toggle true to fade in, otherwise false

        Parameters:
        context - Interface to global information about an application environment
        view - The views to fade
        animation - The animation type
        isFadeIn - Toggle true to fade in, otherwise false

      • translateAnimation

        public static void translateAnimation(float toX,
                                      float toY,
                                      long duration,
                                      long startDelay,
                                      boolean isCallback,
                                      android.view.View... view)
        Method is used to translate a view by given pixel values for X and Y
        Parameters:
        toX - The x-coordinate the view will translate to
        toY - The y-coordinate the view will translate to
        duration - How long the animation will last (milliseconds)
        startDelay - Set animation start offset (ms)
        isCallback - Toggle for setting callback or not
        view - The view to translate

      • translateAnimation

        public static void translateAnimation(float fromX,
                                      float toX,
                                      float fromY,
                                      float toY,
                                      long duration,
                                      long startDelay,
                                      boolean isCallback,
                                      android.view.View... view)
        Parameters:
        fromX - The x-coordinate the view will translate from
        toX - The x-coordinate the view will translate to
        fromY - The y-coordinate the view will translate from
        toY - The y-coordinate the view will translate to
        duration - How long the animation will last (milliseconds)
        startDelay - Set animation start offset (ms)
        isCallback - Toggle for setting callback or not
        view - The view to translate

      • scaleAnimation

        public static void scaleAnimation(float fromX,
                                  float toX,
                                  float fromY,
                                  float toY,
                                  long duration,
                                  android.view.View... view)
        Method is used to apply a scale animation
        Parameters:
        fromX - The x-coordinate to scale from
        toX - The x-coordinate to scale to
        fromY - The y-coordinate to scale from
        toY - The y-cordinate to scale to
        duration - How long the animation will last (milliseconds)
        view - The view to translate

      • rotateAnimation

        public static void rotateAnimation(float fromDegrees,
                                   float toDegrees,
                                   float pivotXValue,
                                   float pivotYValue,
                                   long duration,
                                   boolean isInfinite,
                                   android.view.View... view)
        Method is used to rotate views
        Parameters:
        fromDegrees - The degree from which to rotate
        toDegrees - The degree to rotate to
        pivotXValue - Specifies how pivotXValue should be interpreted. One of Animation.ABSOLUTE, Animation.RELATIVE_TO_SELF, or Animation.RELATIVE_TO_PARENT
        pivotYValue - Specifies how pivotYValue should be interpreted. One of Animation.ABSOLUTE, Animation.RELATIVE_TO_SELF, or Animation.RELATIVE_TO_PARENT
        duration - How long the animation will last (milliseconds)
        isInfinite - True to rotate endlessly, otherwise false
        view - The view to translate

      • onAnimationTranslateListener

        public static void onAnimationTranslateListener(OnAnimationTranslateListener listener)
        Method is used to set callback for when translate animation is complete
        Parameters:
        listener - Callback for when translate animation is complete

      • animPadding

        public static void animPadding(int fromPadding,
                               int toPadding,
                               long duration,
                               boolean isCallback,
                               android.view.View... view)
        Parameters:
        fromPadding - The amount of padding the view should have in the beginning of the animation (pixels)
        toPadding - The amount of padding the view will have at the end of the animation (pixels)
        duration - How long the animation will last (milliseconds)
        isCallback - Toggle for setting callback or not
        view - The view whose padding will be modified

      • onAnimationPaddingListener

        public static void onAnimationPaddingListener(OnAnimationPaddingListener listener)
        Method is used to set callback for when padding animation is complete
        Parameters:
        listener - Callback for when padding animation is complete

        Method is used to set callback for when value animator updates
        Parameters:
        listener - Callback for when value animator updates
